tgt: kusetjentiswa kabi kwesibonelelo sesondlo sebantfwana kulicala more matshediso uma wati kutsi sondlo sebantfwana lesitfolwa nguloyo lonakekela umntfwana sisetjentiswa ngendlela lengakafaneli, kumsebenti wakho kutsi ubike kueje nsi yekucinisekiswa kwete nhlalakahle eningizimu afrika (isassa).

src: ho ya ka mmuelli wa sassa, paseka letsatsi, letlole la dithuso tsa bana le lefuwa ho mohlokomedi, empa le rere tswe tlhokomelo ya ngwana.
tgt: ngekusho kwalokhulumela isassa paseka letsatsi, imali yesondlo sebantfwa na inikwa umnakekeli wemntfwana, kodvwa inhloso yayo kutsi inakekele umntfwana.

src: ha jwale letlole leo ke r480 ka kgwedi ho ngwana ka mong.
tgt: lesibonelelo nyalo singer480 ngenyanga umntfwana ngamunye.

src: letlole la dithuso tsa bana le ile la thakgolwa ke mmuso ho fana ka tshehetso ya ditjhelete ho bana ba dulang malapeng a futsanehileng.
tgt: sibonelelo sesondlo sebantfwana sacalwa nguhulumende kute anikete kwesekelwa ngetimali eba ntfwaneni labahlala emakhaya laphuyile.

src: "hang ha tshebediso e mpe e tlalehwa, ho etswa dipatlisiso.
tgt: "masinyane emva kwekubika ngekusetjentiswa kabi kwalesondlo, kutawentiwa luphenyo.

src: haeba dipatlisiso di fumana hore tjhelete e fumanwang ha e sebedisetswe molemong wa ngwana, sassa e ka kgetha motho e mong ya tlang ho amohela le ho sebedisa letlole leo lebitsong la ngwana."
tgt: uma luphenyo lukhomba kutsi imali letfolwako ayisetjentiselwa tidzingo temntfwana, isassa ingakhetsa lomunye umuntfu lotasitfola lesondlo bese uyisebentisela kugcina tonkhe tidzingo temntfwana," kusho letsatsi.

src: haeba dipatlisiso di fumana hore tjhelete e fumanwang ha e sebedisetswe molemong wa ngwana, sassa e ka kgetha motho e mong ya tlang ho amohela le ho sebedisa letlole leo lebitsong la ngwana," ho rialo letsatsi.
tgt: ungete watsi kumcoka kutsi umnakekeli wekucala, lonakekela umntfwana onkhe malanga, kube ngilomuntfu lobhalisiwe kutsi ungumnakekeli.

src: o tlatsetsa ka hore ho bohlokwa hore mohlokomedi wa mantlha, eo a hlokomelang ngwana letsatsi le le tsatsi, e be yena ya ngodisetsweng ho tla fumantshwa letlole.
tgt: "esimeni lapho khona umntfwana asuka kulomunye umnakekeli aya kulomunye, lesibonelelo kufuneka simlandzele umntfwana.

src: "boemong boo ngwana a tlohang ho mohlokomedi e mong ho ya ho e mong, le tlole le lokela ho latela ngwana morao.
tgt: umnakekeli wekucala kufuneka abike kusassa kutsi umntfwana akasanakekelwa nguye, bese umnakekeli lomusha uyeta atofaka sicelo sesibonelelo," kungeta letsatsi.

src: mohlokomedi wa pele o lebeletswe ho ya tlaleha ho sassa hore ngwana ha a sa le tlhokomelong ya hae, mme mohlokomedi e motjha wa mantlha o tlameha ho tla ho etsa kopo e ntjha ya letlole," ho tlatseletsa letsatsi.
tgt: letsatsi utsi bantfu labachubekako kutfola lesondlo semntfwana kube umntfwana akasanakekelwa ngibo, kutawudzingeka kutsi babuyise lemali lebayitfole ngaloku ngekho emtsetfweni.

src: letsatsi o re batho ba ntseng ba tswela pele ho fumana le tlole la dithuso tsa bana kamora hore bana ba se ba hlola ba eba tlasa tlhokomelo ya bona, ba tla tlameha ho lefa tjhelete eo ba e fumaneng ka mokgwa oo o seng molaong.
tgt: bangahle futsi bashushiswe ngekwe mtsetfo uma kungavela kutsi bebahlose kukhwabanisa.

src: ba ka boela ba qoswa ka botlokotsebe haeba morero wa ho qhekella naha o ka netefatswa e le bobodu.
tgt: loku kungenteka nasebantfwini labasebentisa kabi sondlo semntfwana – lebayiniketwe yisassa kutsi basekele ngetimali ba ntfwana labanekukhubateka lokukhulu labadzinga kunakekelwa ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, kungaba sondlo sekukhubateka noma sondlo sekuluphala.

src: ditlamorao tse tshwanang le tseo di sebediswa le ho batho ba sebedisang ha mpe matlole a ho hlokomela batho ba hlo kang hlokomelo e tebileng – a fanwang ke sassa ho fana ka tshehetso ya ditjhelete ho bana ba nang le boqhwala bo mpefetseng bo hlokang tlho komelo ya letsatsi le leng le le leng, matlole a boqhwala kapa matlole a maqheku.
tgt: "uma ngabe lemali isetjentiselwa kunatsa tjwala, tidzakwamiva noma kuge mbula, ingakasebenti kusekela umuntfu lofanelekile kutsi ayitfole, lenchubo lengenhla yekubika kutawufuneka ilandzelwe," kusho letsatsi.

src: ke mang ya ka kenyang kopo ya letlole la dithuso tsa bana?
tgt: ngubani longafaka sicelo sesondlo sekusekela umntfwana?

src: ho ya ka letsatsi, moahi ofe kapa ofe wa moafrika borwa, moahi wa moshwelella kapa mophaphathehi ya ngodisi tsweng ka molao ya hlokomelang ngwana, ebang ke ngwana wa hae wa madi kapa tjhe, a ka kenya kopo ya letlole la dithuso tsa bana, ha feela a ikamahantsha le ditekanyetso tse thathamisitsweng ka tlase: ngwana le mohlokomedi ba tlameha ho dula afrika borwa ka ho sa feleng.
tgt: ngekusho kwaletsatsi, kungaba ngunoma ngumuphi umuntfu wase ningizimu afrika, losakhamuti ngalokuphelele noma losifikanemtfwalo lonemaphepha lonakekela umntfwana, akukhatsalekile kutsi umntfwana wakhe noma akusuye wakhe ngekutalwa, angafaka sicelo sesibonelelo sekunakekela umntfwana, uma nje kungumake noma kungubabe lohambisana naletidzingo letilandzelako: umntfwananemnakekeli kufuneka babe takhamuti taseningizimu afrika ngalokuphelele.

src: mohlokomedi o tlameha ho ba le dilemo tse 16 (maemong a malapa a ete lletsweng pele ke bana) kapa ho feta.
tgt: umnakekeli kufuneka abe neminyaka le16 budzala (esimeni semindeni lephe tfwe ngumntfwana) noma ngetulu.

src: ngwana o tlameha ho ba ka tlasa dilemo tse 18. moamohedi wa letlole o tlameha ho ba mohlokome di wa mantlha wa ngwana mme ngwana o lokela ho dula le yena.
tgt: umntfwanalonakekelwako kufuneka abe neminyaka lengaphasi kwe18 budzala.

src: moamohedi o tlameha ho fihlella ditlhoko tsa tlhahlobo ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa (tlhahlobo ya lekeno).
tgt: lotfola sibonelelo sesondlo semntfwana kufuneka abe ngumnakekeli wekucala futsi abe ahlala naye lomntfwana.

src: setjhaba sa rona se iletse koduwa ya ho hlokahala ha batjha tameneng ya enyobeni vukuzenzele unnamed dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng, malapa a lekeishene la scenery park haufi le east london, a ne a fumane ditaba tseo ho seng motswadi ya ratang ho di utlwa.
tgt: sive setfu sililela kulahleka kwetimphilo letincane engotini yasetjwaleni enyobeni sihle manda emavikini lambalwa lengcile imindeni yaselokishini lasescenery park eeast london, itfole tindzaba wonkhe umtali lathandazela kutsi angativa.

src: a ne a bolellwe ha bana ba 21 ba fumanwe ba hlokahetse tameneng.
tgt: batjelwe kutsi bantfwana babo labange21 batfolakale bashonile, ethaveni.

src: e monyane ho bona kaofela o ne a le dilemo di 13 feela.
tgt: umntfwana lomncane kakhulu labelapho bekaneminyaka le13 budzala.

src: diphuputso tsa sepolesa di tswelapele ka potloko e kgolo.
tgt: luphenyo lwemaphoyisa lwalengoti luchubeka ngekushesha.

src: ntle le diphuputso tsena, mmasepala e moholo wa buffalo city, le ona o lekola taba ya hore na e be tamene eo ha e a tlola e meng ya melawana ya mmasepala.
tgt: ngemphumela waloluphenya, masipala wasedolobhenikati ibuffalo ubuka kutsi lethaveni ngabe ayikayephuli yini imitsetfosimiso yamasipala.

src: malapa ana re tla dula re a hopola mme re tla a beha le dithapelong hore a kgone ho amohela masisapelo ana.
tgt: emicabangweni yetfu kanye nasemithandazweni yetfu sikhumbula lemindeni lebukene nalolusizi lolungaka lolungakhulumeki.

src: re leboha mmuso wa kapa botjhabela ka ho thusa malapa a amehileng le avbob ka ho thusa malapa ana mabapi le ho boloka bana bana.
tgt: siyamncoma hulumende wesifundza sasemphumalanga kapa ngekusita lemindeni levelelwe ngulengoti, kanye naavbob lotsembise kutsi utawusita lemindeni ngekubangcwabela.

src: leha diphuputso di ntse di tswela pele ho netefatsa hore malapa a mahlatsipa a qetella a tsebile se etsahetseng, empa ho na le mathata ao re tlamehang ho tobana le ona jwalo ka setjhaba.
tgt: ngisho nome ngabe tiphatsimandla tingalinga kuhlanganisa kutsi kwentekeni kute kutsi kube nebulungiswa kulabo labavelelwe ngulengoti, kusanenkhulumo lekumele kutsi sibenayo njengelive.

src: mathata ao ke pharela ya tahi baneng.
tgt: yindzaba yenkinga yekunatsa tjwala kwebantfwana labasebancane.

src: ditshwantsho tse neng di tletse ho inthanete tsa moketjana ona wa ‘ho thabela ho qeta ho ngola ditlhahlobo’, di ne di bontsha batjha ba neng ba phahamiseditse dibotlolo tsa jwalo hodimo.
tgt: titfombe nemifanekiso letfunyelwe etinkhundleni tekuchumana yelidzili lelatiwa ngekutsi ‘kubeka phasi emapeni’ kuleyo ndzawo ebusuku kubonakala bantfu labasha batijabulisa babambe emabhodlela etjwala.

src: bongata ba bona bo ne bo bonahala hore bo dilemong tse ka tlase ho tse 18. bongata ba batjha ba scenery park ba neng ba bue le boraditaba ba ne ba bolele ha ba ne ba fumane molaetsa metjheng ya kgokahano ya hore bohle ba tla ya moketjaneng oo ba tla fumana jwala ba mahala.
tgt: bonkhe labalapho kuletitfombe babukeka basengakaphumi ekubeni ngemabhobhodlelana netidzandzane.

src: ho nwa ha batjha ke pharela e kgolo naheng ena, le mokgatlo wa matjhaba wa tsa bophelo bo botle o bolela ha naha ena e le e nngwe ya tse nwang haholo.
tgt: linyenti lebantfu labasha basescenery park batjele betindzaba kutsi bona babone tatiso etinkhundleni tekuchumana, lebetikhangisa ngekutfolakala kwetjwala bamahhala kubo bonkhe labatawuhambela lomcimbi ngalobo busuku.

src: botahwa batjheng bo tsamaisana le mathata a kang ho thisa sekolong, ho lemala ka lebaka la botahwa bona, ho ba le menahano ya ho ipolaya esitana le boitshwaro bo hlephileng.
tgt: kukhula kwekuvumeleka emmangweni kwebantfu kutsi banatse tjwala sekugucuke kwaba yinkinga lenkhulu kulelive lapho khona linyenti lebantfu labanatsako sevele batsatfwa njengetidzakwa yinhlangano yemhlaba yetemphilo.

src: re tlameha ho kopana mmoho re le setjhaba ho lwantsha bothata bona bo senyetsang batjha ba rona maphelo, bo ba etse makgoba a tahi.
tgt: kunatswa kwetjwala lusha kubanga kutsi kube nekungasebenti kahle, nekuphutselwa kuya esikolweni, netingoti letiphatselene netjwala, nemicabango yekutibulala nekulinga kutibulala, kanye nekutiphatsa ngendlela lenebungoti.

src: jwalo ka malapa, re tlameha ho bua ka bothata bona ba jwala mme re nke le mehato e lokelang.
tgt: kufanele kutsi sihlangane silwe nalesihlava lesibulala likusasa lebantfu labasha kanye neminyaka yabo lemihle yekuphila, lesibenta kutsi babe tigcila tetjwala.

src: ke tlolo ya molao ho nwa jwala ha ngwana ya dilemo di ka tlase ho tse 18. jwalo ka batho ba baholo, re tlameha ho kgaotsa mokgwa wa ho roma bana jwala, kapa hona ho ba rekela bona.
tgt: njengemindeni kufanele kutsi sibe netinkhulumiswano letivulekile letimayelana netjwala futsi sibeke imikhawulo.

src: ho sebetsa leha e le ha jwang ha dibaka tsena ho bontsha ho hloleha ha ba ka taolong ho qobella melao e behilweng.
tgt: njengebantfu labadzala kufanele kutsi siyiyekele lemikhuba yekutfuma bantfwana kutsi bayositsengela tjwala noma yekuvuma uma basicela kutsi sibatsengele tjwala.

src: ka ho ya ka molao o laolang jwala, beng ba dibaka tse rekisang jwala dilaesense tsa bona ha di ba dumelle ho rekisetsa batjha ba dilemo di ka tlase ho tse 18 jwala.
tgt: intfo lebonakala kuto tonkhe letehlakalo sasethaveni yasenyobeni, senhlekelele yasendzaweni yekutijabulisa yasebusuku ethrob edurban ngemnyaka we2000, kanye nasethaveni yaseosi ekhayelitsha ngemnyaka we2015, ngukutsi tonkhe letindzawo betitsengisela bantfwana labancane tjwala.

src: re ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sebedisana le ba ka taolong ho netefatsa hore ditamene, dishibini, dibaka tsa boithabiso le tse rekisang jwala hore di fumana kotlo e di tshwanelang ha di tlola molao.
tgt: kuchubeka kwetindzawo tephule imitsetfo kukhombisa kutsi tiphatsimandla tiyehluleka kugcina kulandzelwa kwemtsetfo.

src: re ipiletsa le ho mapolesa ho netefatsa hore ha ho dibaka tse rekisang jwala haufi le dikolo le hore ha ho jwala bo rekisetswang bana.
tgt: ngekwemtsetfo wavelonkhe wetjwala, banikati betindzawo letinetimvume tekutsengisa tjwala abakavunyelwa kutsi batsengisele nome ngabe ngubani loneminyaka lengephasi kwe18.

src: e nngwe ntho eo re e hlokometseng ke hore mathata a tahi batjheng a atile haholo dibakeng tseo dibaka tsa boithabiso tsa batjha di leng mmalwa ho tsona.
tgt: kufanele kutsi batsatse tinyatselo letivakalako kucinisekisa kutsi nome ngabe ngubani labamtsengisela tjwala mdzala.

src: setjhaba sa scenery park se boletse ha dibaka tsa dipapadi, tsa thuto mmoho le tse thusang kgolong ya batjha e le leqeme feela, e leng se etsang batjha ba qetelle ba ‘kena ditameneng’.
tgt: sicela yonkhe imimmango kutsi isebentisane netiphatsimandla kucinisekisa kutsi emathaveni, emashibhini, tindzawo tekucedza situnge kanye netekutijabulisa letephula umtsetfo tiyajeziswa.

src: ho latela koduwa ena, setjhaba se boletse ha ho se na mabala a dipapadi scenery park, dilaeborari kapa tsona ditsi tsa batjha.
tgt: sicela emaphoyisa etfu kutsi aphakamise kugcinwa kwemtsetfo lovimbela kutsengiswa kwetjwala edvute netikolo futsi ente kutsi kube nekucashelwa kwaleto tindzawo kute kucinisekiswe kutsi tjwala abutsengiselwa bantfwana.

src: jwalo ka mmuso boemong ba naha, profensi le ba mmasepala, re tlameha ho mamela sello sa setjhaba sena, le tse ding, ka hore re ahe dibaka tsa boithabiso, re thehe le mananeo le diprojeke tse tla tswela batjha ba rona molemo profensing.
tgt: lenye intfo leliciniso kutsi tjwala buyindlela yekubalekela liciniso lemphilo yebantfu labasha emimmangweni lapho khona kute tindzawo letiphephile netekukhibika letihambisana neminyaka yabo.

src: re le setjhaba, re tlameha ho sebedisana le mekga ya setjhaba e shebaneng le bonokwane mekgatlo ya setjhaba le ya taolo ya dikolo boitekong ba ho netefatsa paballo le tshireletso ya bana ba rona.
tgt: njengahulumende ezingeni lavelonkhe, lesifundza nasezingeni lahulumende wendzawo kufuneka kutsi siphendvule kuleticelosikhalo talommango kanye netaleminye imimmango ngekutsi sisungule tindzawo tekukhibika letinyenti, tinsita, tinhlelo, kanye nemiklamo yelusha lwetfu kuletindzawo lebetincishwe ematfuba kulesifundza.

src: re tlameha ho toboketsa mantsweng a reng "ngwana o hodiswa ke setjhaba".
tgt: labanye balingani betfu kutenhlalo labafana nabosomabhizinisi bemmango kufuneka kutsi basisite ngeminikelo.

src: ha re sebetseng mmoho ho sireletsa setjhaba sena sa kamoso ho bolaweng ke dithethefatsi le jwala.
tgt: njengemimango kufanele kutsi sisebentisane netinkhundla temmango temaphoyisa, netinhlangano tetfu temmango kanye nemikhandlu lephetse tikolo kutsi sidlale indzima kakhulu etimphilweni tebantfwana betfu kanye nasekucinisekiseni kuphepha kanye nenhlalakahle yabo.

src: ha re kopaneng ho netefatsa hore bohle ba shebaneng feela le ho etsa tjhelete ba sa kgathalle maphelo a bana ba rona ha ba dumellwe ho rekisa moo re dulang.
tgt: njengoba sisho setfu lesihlakaniphile sendzabuko yaseafrika sitsi "umntfwana ukhuliswa ngummango wonkhe."

src: le rona ha re beng mohlala o motle tshebedisong ya jwala.
tgt: asisebentisaneni ngekubambana kute sivikele situkulwane sakusasa lesiligugu kulokudlakadlakatwa tjwala netidzakamiva kanye nemitselela yako.

src: monkeypox afrika borwa vukuzenzele unnamed letona la tsa bophelo ngaka joe phaahla, o netefaditse taba ya hore monkeypox e fumanehile afrika borwa sebokeng sa boraditaba, tshwane, gauteng.
tgt: incubulunjane yetingobiyane (imonkeypox) eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed indvuna yetemphi lo dkt.

src: o boletse hore o fumane tlaleho ho mokgatlo wa naha wa ditshebeletso tsa dilaboratori (nhls) hore ditekong tsa bona ba fumane hore monkeypox e se e le teng afrika borwa.
tgt: joe phaahla ucinisekisile kutsi lencubulunjaneyetingo biyane seyitfolakele lapha eningizimu afrika ngesikhatsi acocisana kungasikudzala nebeti ndzaba epitoli, egauteng.

src: kokwanahloko ena e fumanehile profensing ya gauteng le ya kapa bophirima.
tgt: utsite utfole umbiko lovela enational health laboratory services (inhls) kutsi bakucinisekisile kubakhona kwelencubulunjane yetingobiyane lapha eningizimu afrika ngekusebentisa luhlolo lwaselabhorethri.

src: monkeypox ke bohloko bo seng matla, bo hlahella ng e le matjhatjhetsi kapa diso letlalong la motho.
tgt: leligciwane selitfolakele egauteng nasenshonalanga kapa.

src: ke bohloko bo seng bohale mme sekgahla sa bona sa ho bolaya ke persente feela.
tgt: lencubulunjane ivamise kuba sifo lesibonakala kancane ngetilondza nome tinshabusuku esikhu mbeni.

src: mathwasong a dilemo tsa bo 2000, bohloko bona ho ile ha tlalehwa ha bo atile dinaheng tsa afrika tse kang nigeria, democratic republic of the congo, central african republic le ghana.
tgt: lesifo sesike sabikwa emaveni aseafrika lafana nenigeria, eriphabhliki yentsandvo yelinyenti yasecongo, central african republic naseghana ekuca leni kweminyaka yabo2000.

src: hona jwale bohloko bona bo atile haholo yuropa mme uk ke yona e nang le palo e hodimo ya bakudi ba fetang 700, ho latele spain ka ba fetang 500 mme ho latele jeremane, portugal le fora.
tgt: lokubhedvuka kwanyalo kubonakala kunemazinga lasetulu eyurophu lapho kuhamba khona embili iuk ngetehlakalo letingetulu kwe700, bese kutsi spain sona sibe nje ngetulu kwe500, kulandzele lasejalimani, laseportugal nefrance.

src: letona le boletse ha mokgatlo wa naha wa mahloko a tshwaetsanang (nicd) o rupella basebeletsi ba tsa bophelo bo botle ka inthanete hore ba kgone ho bona matshwao a bohloko bona mme ho etsuwe diteko tse tlamehileng ho etsuwa tsa bohloko bona dilabora toring.
tgt: indvuna itsite sikhungo savelonkhe setifo letitsa tselanako (inicd) ichuba tifundvo tekusebenta ufundza ngeinthanethi kutisebenti tetemphilo kute tikhone kusibona lesifo kute kwentiwe luhlolo lwaselabhorethri loludzingekile.

src: "bohloko bona, bo tshwaetsana feela ka ho thetsana, ka hoo, o ke se tshwaetsehe ka ho ba ka tlung le mokudi wa bohloko bona," letona le boletse jwalo.
tgt: "lesifo sibhebhetseka kuphela nakube nekutsi ntsana edvute, ngakoke ngeke usitfole ngekutsi ube sekamelweni linye nemuntfu losuleleke ngaso," kwasho indvuna.

src: letona phaahla o netefaleditse maafrika borwa hore monkeypox ha se kokwanahloko e ntjha, ka hoo, borasaense ba rona ba na le tsebo ka yona.
tgt: indvuna phaahla ucinisekise bantfu baseningizimu afrika kutsi lencubulu njane ayisilo ligciwane lelingazange selibonwe ngaphambilini futsi bososayensi banelwatiso ngalo.

src: modulasetulo wa komiti ya matona ya dikeletso mabapi le covid19, eo hape e boetseng e le setho sa nhls, profesara koleka mlisana, o re monkeypox ke sewa haholo dinaheng tse bohareng le leboya ho afrika mme le teng ha e matla hakalo.
tgt: sihlalo welikomidi letindvuna lekweluleka (imac) mayelana necovid19 kanye nelilunga lesigungu senhls, solwati koleka mlisana, utsite lencubulunjane ingubhubhane wesigodzi lotfolakala esigodzini sasecentral nasenyakatfo afrika leyatiwa njengale ngenamandla kangako.

src: bohloko bo sa atang ke boo hangata bo fumane hang bathong ba itseng kapa sebakeng se itseng feela.
tgt: lesifo sivamise kutfolakala esigodzini lesitsite emkha tsini kwebantfu labatsite nome endzaweni letsite.

src: o boletse ha monkeypox kae kae e ntse e itshwanela le smallpox.
tgt: utsite kunekufanana kwetimphawu emkhatsi ni kwalencubulunjane yetingobiyane kanye nencubulunjane leyatiwa ngesmallpox.

src: "monkeypox e na le ente le meriana ya yona.
tgt: "kunemitsi kanye nekwelashwa lokukhona kwelencubulunjane yetingobiyane.

src: bohloko bona bo itlhahisa e ka mokgohlane le legionnaires.
tgt: lesifo sitiveta ngetimphawu letifana neimfuluwenza kanye netesifo selegionnaires.

src: se molemo ke hore ha o kgona ho hlalosetsa ngaka bothata ba hao, ho ba bobebe hore o etswe diteko tsa bohloko bona mme hape ha ho bobebe hore e tshwaetsane jwalo ka kokwanahloko tsena tse amang matshwafo, yona e tshwaetsana ka ho thetsana.
tgt: lokumcoka kutsi umuntfu lovela nendlela tsite yetekwelashwa kulula kumcilonga futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu kutsi kulukhuni kutsi sendluliseleke, asifani neligciwane lekuphefumula, ngobe sisuleleka ngekutsintsana.

src: o tshwaetseha feela ha o ile wa thetsana le mokudi wa bohloko bona," o boletse jwalo.
tgt: usitfola kuphela nangabe utsintsane nemuntfu lonaso," kwasho mlisana.

src: bohloko ba legionnaires bo tshwana le ba nyomonia e matla.
tgt: sifo selegionnaires siluhlobo lwenyumoniya lenemandla kakhulu.

src: profesara mlisana o boletse hore ho bohlokwa ho tsomana le batho ba ileng ba thetsana le bakudi ba bohloko bona, mme lefapha la bophelo bo botle le tla tswela pele le ho etsa jwalo.
tgt: solwati mlisana utsite kulandzelela labo labatsi ntsene kubalulekile kuloku kantsi litiko letemphilo litawuchubeka likwente loko.

src: o netefaleditse maafrika borwa hore dilaboratori tsa rona di na le disebediswa tse lekaneng ho ka kgona ho hlwaya ditshwaetso tse ntjha tse ka hlahang.
tgt: ucinisekise bantfu baseningizimu afrika kutsi sakhiwonchanti sasela bhorethri sinato tonkhe tinsita letingakhona kugadza nome ngabe ngukuphi kutseleleka lokusha lokungahle kube khona.

src: o sebdisa tsebo ya hae e kenelletseng ya tsa phepo le dilemo tse ngata tsa boiphihlelo bakeng sa ho hla hisa meroho le dikgoho tse hodisitsweng ka mokgwa wa setho polasing ya hae ka morero wa ho matlafatsa basadi ba bang ho ba dihwai.
tgt: ethel zulu ngu mlimi lomncane lomangalisako losafufusa.

src: ngaka zulu a dilemo tse 48, a nang le lengolo la bongaka ho tsa phepo, o na le polasi ya dihektara tse 23 cullinan haufi le tshwane, moo a hlahisang le ho pheha meroho le dikgoho tse a di romellang mabenkeleng a maholo a mmalwa.
tgt: usebentisa lwati lwakhe lolujulile lwekudla lokunemsoco kanye neminyaka yekukhicita tinkhukhu netibhidvo ngekwemvelo epulazini lakhe ngenhloso yekutfutfukisa labanye bomake kute kutsi babe balimi labalimela kutsengisa.

src: ngaka zulu o tlohetse mosebetsi lekaleng la tsa temo porofenseng ya leboya bophirima mme a theha khamphani ya hae ya borupelli e bitswang hope nutrition business consultants.
tgt: zulu (48), loneticu tebudokotela kutekudla lokunemsoco unelipulazi lelingemahektha lange23 ecullinan ngaphandle kwepitoli, lapho akhicita khona ngekwemvelo tibhidvo netinkhukhu ngekusebenta imikhicito ngekulima layiphakela etimakethe letinyenti.

src: ke ka mora hore a fallele gauteng empa a se fumane mosebetsi wa setsebi sa tsa phepo.
tgt: lipulazi lakhe liphindze futsi lisingatse titjudeni letinge20 leticeceshelwa tifundvo tekulima.

src: "ngaka zulu o hlalositse hore o sebeditse diporofenseng tse tshelela ka khamphane ya hae, a thusa basadi le batjha ka tsa temo le ho rua.
tgt: zulu wayekela umsebenti wakhe elitikweni letekulima enyakatfo nshonalanga kute acale iejensi yakhe yekucecesha leyatiwa ngekutsi yihope nutrition business consultants.

src: ho rua dikgoho bakeng sa thekisoka 2017, ngaka zulu o ile a elellwa hore thupello ya hae ha e na moelelo ntle le sephetho, kahoo o ile a reka polasi hore a kgone ho kenya tsebo ya hae tshebetsong.
tgt: loku kwenteka ngemuva kwekutsi atewuhlala egauteng kodvwa wangakhoni kutfola umsebenti ngengesati sekudla lokunemsoco.

src: tsatsing lena e se e le morui wa dikgoho tse reki swang tse fetang 7 500. qalong leano la hae e ne e le ho hlahisa meroho fela.
tgt: unelutsandvo lolukhulu lwetekulima kantsi umbononchanti wakhe kutsi kungene bomake labanyenti kutekulima, lokungumkhakha lakholelwa ekutseni unemandla lagcinekile ekutfutfukisa nekudala imisebenti.

src: "ke ne ke hloka dikgoho bakeng sa monontsha.
tgt: "ngisebente iminyaka lesiphohlongo, ngisebentisana nebalimisi, futsi sisite balimi labanyenti macondzana nekuphepha kwekudla, tekuhlanteka nekudla lokunemsoco.

src: ke ne ke ya matlong a batho ke o lata hore dijalo tsa ka di hole di nonne.
tgt: tekulima bekusolo ngititsandza kusukela ngesikhatsi ngisasemncane futsi angizange sengitibone ngenta lokunye."

src: "o ile a tlatseletsa ka hore dikgoho tsa hae di hola ka mokgwa wa tlhaho, ha di na dihomoune.
tgt: "wengete ngekutsi tinkhukhu atigcinwa ehhokweni sonkhe sikhatsi futsi temvelo, tite tikhulisimtimba.

src: o sebedisa monontsha wa dikgoho bakeng sa ho hodisa meroho e jwalo ka sepinitjhi, borokholi, khabetjhe, le diphepha.
tgt: usebentisa umcuba wetinkhukhu nakahlanyela tibhidvo letifanana nesipinashi, ibhrokholi, ikhabishi nabopelepele.

src: ntle le mabenkele, ngaka zulu o rekisetsa le bahwebi ba rekisang mebileng dihlahiswa tsa hae.
tgt: kwengeta kumasuphamakethe, dkt.

src: kgwebo ya hae e atlehile haholo hoo a bileng a file basadi ba 12 mosebetsi wa moshwelella.
tgt: zulu uphindze futsi aphakele imikhicito yakhe kulabatsengisa etitaladini.

src: o boetse o labalabela le ho ba emong wa bahlahisi ba meroho le dikgoho tse hodiswang ka mokgwa wa tlhaho ba tshetjwang haholo afrika borwa.
tgt: libhizinisi lakhe linemphumelelo ngendlela yekutsi ucashe bomake laba12 siphelane.

src: ho matlafatsa basadi ka temo ngaka zulu o dumela hore temo e ka bapala karolo ya ho matlafatsa basadi moruong le ho ba thehela mesebetsi e mengata.
tgt: zulu, tinkhukhu tingumkhakha lomcoka kakhulu kulelive, ngobe imindeni leminyenti idla tinkhukhu kwengca nome ngabe nguluphi luhlobo lwenyama.

src: "o phaella ka hore basadi ha ba a tlameha ho itekanyetsa ho temo fela empa ba tlameha ho leka le mesebetsi e meng ya lekala lena, jwalo ka ho pheha, ho kenya dijo ka hara dipakana le ho reka ba rekisa.
tgt: utimisele futsi ngekutsi abe ngulomunye webakhiciti labatsembekile lapha eningizimu afrika wetinkhukhu letingagcinwa ehhokweni sonkhe sikhatsi netibhidvo temvelo.

src: "ho iketsetsa tjhelete ya bona ke hona fela ho ka re thusang ho fedisa sekgobo sa tlhekefetso ya bong, mme hoo ho ka fihlellwa ka temo hara tse ding," ho rialo ngaka zulu.
tgt: weluleka bomake labanesifiso sekulima kutsi bacale kancane futsi bangalindzeli kwesekelwa nguhulumende.

src: dikgwebo tse nyane di kgothalletswa ho kopa thusonosihle shelembe letona la ntshetso pele ya dikgwebo tse nyane, stella ndabeniabrahams, o kgothalleditse dikgwebo tse nyane tsa metse setoropo le mahaeng ho kopa thuso ho lenaneo la bohwebi la metsesetoropo le mahae (trep).
tgt: "nangabe kwesekwela nguhulumende kukutfola, kutawuba kukufukula lokwengetiwe.

src: ha a bua sebokeng sa batjha sa shetradesza se sa tswa tshwarelwa tshwane, letona le itse boleng bo hodimodimo ba trep ke miliyone e le nngwe ya diranta, karolo enngwe ya yona ke e o e fiwang mme enngwe ke e o e kadi ngwang.
tgt: hamba ucocisane nemasuphamakethe endzawo kute utfole kutsi afuna lizinga lelinjani fusi nisebentisane ngemacembu kute kutsi nihlangabetane netimfuno telizinga nelinani lawo," kwengeta yena njalo.

src: lenaneo la mabaka a manyane le mabenkele a dipompong lenaneo la tshehetso ya dikgwebo tsa ho kobolla le ho penta dipalangwang le ho teha dikoloi (mmoho le mabenkele a manyane a ikemetseng a rekisang dikarolo tsa dipalangwang le bahwebi ba banyane ba dikoloi) lenaneo la tshehetso ya dilakga lenaneo la tshehetso ya dikgwebo tsa diaparo, letlalo le masela lenaneo la dikgwebo tse hlahisang dihlahiswa tsa ho itlhokomela lenaneo la tshehetso ya dispazashopo lenaneo la tshehetso ya dikgwebo tsa ditshisa nyama le dijo tse phehi lwengo ka ingodisa ho smmesa.
tgt: "wengeta ngekutsi bomake kufanele kutsi bangagcini kuphela ngekulima kodvwa kudzingeka kutsi bahlole naletinye tindlela tekusebenta talemboni letifanana nekusebenta imikhitito yetekulima, kufaka emaphakethini kanye nekutsengisa futsi.

src: gov.
tgt: zulu.

src: jwalo ka matsapa a ho etsa bonnete ba hore metjha ya tshehetso ya tjhelete bakeng sa dikgwebo tse nyane e ba metle mme e ba bobebe, mmuso o ntse o sebetsana le ho kopanya ditheo bakeng sa dikgwebo tse nyane ho etsa setheo se le seng.
tgt: emabhizinisi lamancane ayagcugcutelwa kutsi afake ticelo tekusekelwanosihle shelembe indvuna yetekutfu tfukisa emabhizinisi lamancane, stella ndabeniabrahams, ugcugcutele emabhizinisi lamancane emalokishini nasetindzaweni tasema khaya kutsi afake ticelo tekwesekelwa ngekusebentisa luhlelo lwete mabhizinisi asemalokishi nasetindzaweni tasemakhaya (itrep).

src: "hajwale re motjheng wa ho kopanya sefa le seda ha mmoho le khamphane ya ntshetsopele ya dibanka tsa mahatammoho.
tgt: "sikwenta ngenhloso kutsi silungise kuswelakala kwemisebenti nebuphuya, siphindze futsi sibe nesibopho sekutsi sikhulise umnotfo," kwasho yona njalo indvuna ndabeniabrahams.

src: "lenaneo la shetrades ndabeniabrahams o itse ka metjha e fapaneng, mmuso o thusitse lekala la dikgwebo tse nyane ho hola le ho theha mesebetsi.
tgt: ngesikhatsi akhuluma emhlanganweni welusha weshetradesza lesandza kubanjelwa lapha epitoli, indvuna itsite samba lesikhulu semalimboleko setrep sibe esigidzini semarandi lesinye, incenye yinye iba sibonelomali bese kutsi lenye incenye ibe imalimboleko.

src: "lefapha la ntshetsopele ya dikgwebo tse nyane le seda ba thehile tshebedisano mmoho le setheo sa matjhaba sa dikgwebo (itc), ho tlisa shetradesza afrika borwa, le ho theha shetradesza hub.
tgt: bosomabhizinisi labasetindzaweni tasemakhaya nome emalokishini bangafaka sicelo sekwesekelwa, lokufaka ekhatsi kusekelwa ngetimali, ngekusebentisa lifomu leleteyalekile lelibuya kuejensi yekutfutfukisa emabhizinisi lamancane (iseda), iejensi yetetimali yemabhizinisi lamancane (isefa), iejensi yesikhwa ma savelonkhe sekutfutfu kisa (inef) kanye neejensi yavelonkhe yekutfutfukisa lusha (inyda).

src: "leano lena le ikemiseditse ho matlafatsa dikgwebo tsa basadi hore di se sitiswe ho etsa kgwebo ka naheng, ka dinaheng tsa setereke le ka dinaheng tsa matjhaba.
tgt: letikimi letilandzelako tiyatfolakala kulabo bosomabhizinisi labafanelekako: luhlelo lwekwesekela babhaki betinkhwa nemakhekhe luhlelo lwekusekela kulungiswa kwetimoto kanye netitolo letitsengisa tincenye tetimoto neku khinika timoto (kanye netitolo letincane tetincenye tetimoto naletitimele kanye nabosomabhizinisi betimoto labatimele).

src: shetradesza hub e tshehetsa bahwebi ba basadi ba 10 000 ba afrika borwa ka ho ba matlafatsa ka tsebo ya kgwebo le tlhodisano bonyane sebaka sa dilemo tse nne," ho rialo letona.
tgt: luhlelo lwekwesekela emasilaha luhlelo lwekwesekela labatfunga timphahla tekugcoka, labasebenta ngesikhumba nangendvwangu luhlelo lwekwesekela kuticwala luhlelo lwekwesekela titolo tetisipaza luhlelo lwekwesekela ishisanyama nekudla lokuphekiwekubhalisa kungentiwa ku: smmesa.

src: shetradesza hub e tla ntlafatsa phihlello ya matsete bakeng sa dikgwebo tsa basadi le ho ntshetsapele menyetla ya mesebetsi.
tgt: kucinisekisa kutsi tinchubo tekutfola timali temabhizinisi lamancane kwenteka ngaphandle kwetihibe futsi kwenteka lula, hulumende umatasatasa ngekuhlanganisa ndzawonye tikhungo temabhizinisi lamancane kutsi akhe iejensi yinye.

src: "ho nka karolo ha lefapha le seda ho shetradesza hub ho bontsha boitlamo ba rona ntshetsong pele le ho netefatsa matlafatso ya moruo wa basadi ka hara afrika borwa," ho rialo ndabeniabrahams.
tgt: "kwanyalo simatasatasa ngenchubo yekuhlanganisa isefa neseda kanye neejensi yekutfutfukisa emabhange lasebentisanako.

src: zaha o batla ho tseba haholwanyana ka seda letsetsa 0860 663 7867, o romele imeile ho info@seda.
tgt: "luhlelo lweshetrades ndabeniabrahams utsite ngekusebentisa imitamo leyehlukahlukene, hulumende usite umkhakha wetemabhizinisi lamancane kutsi ukhule futsi udale kucasheka lokudzingeka kakhulu.

src: re lokela ho nka bohato jwale, mmoho, ho fedisa dikgoka kgahlano le basadi vukuzenzele unnamed kgwedi ya basadi e qadile ka ketsahalo e nyarosang.
tgt: kufuneka sente lokutsite nyalo futsi sibambisane kucedza ludlame lolucondziswe kubomake vukuzenzele unnamed icale ngendlela lebuhlungu inyanga yabomake.

src: re boetse re tobane le lehlakore le lebe a setjhaba sa rona.
tgt: sesiphindze sabukana nebumnyama lobubi emmangweni wetfu.

src: kgweding e fetileng sehlopha sa banna le basadi ba neng ba etsa kgatiso ya vidiyo ya mmino morafong o seng o sa rashwe o haufi le krugersdorp se ile sa hlaselwa ke batho ba neng ba hlometse ba betileng basadi ba robedi.
tgt: kulenyanga leyengcile, licembu lemadvodza kanye nelabomake lebebatsatsa titfombe tevidiyo yemculo endzaweni leyimayini lengasasebenti edvute nase krugersdorp bahlaselwa bahlaseli labebahlomile lebahlanganyela badlengula bomake labasiphohlongo.

src: diketsahalo tsena tsa bo kgopo ke thohako tokelong ya basadi le banana ya ho phela le ho sebetsa ka bolo kolohi le ka polokeho.
tgt: letentfo letimbi telunya tibukela phasi emalungelo abomake nemantfomba tane tekutsi baphile futsi basebente ngekukhululeka nangendlela levikelekile.

src: ba betang ha ba batlehe hohang setjhabeng sa rona.

src: re ipiletsa ho baahi ho sebetsa le mapolesa ho nete fatsa hore disenyi tsena di a tshwarwa le ho qoswa.
tgt: luphiko lemaphoyisa ase ningizimu afrika kufuneka lunake letikhalo temma ngo wasewest village, lapho lesigameko senteke khona, lotsi ungaphasi kwekuvinjetelwa macembu emagenge lahlomile laku lendzawo.

src: baahi ba rona ha ba a lokela ho di sireletsa.

src: ho dula ho na le motho ya tsebang ho hong metseng ya rona, ya utlwileng ho hong kapa ya boneng ho hong.
tgt: senta lubito kumimango kutsi isebentisane nema phoyisa kucinisekisa kutsi letigebengu tiyaboshwa bese tiyashushiswa.

src: bothata ke hore bonga ta ba rona re kgetha ho itholela hobane sesenyi e le motswalle, molekane kapa mosebetsimmoho.
tgt: imimango yetfu akufuneki ifihle tigebengu letisemkha tsini kwayo.

src: ka nako tse ding re a tshaba kapa re tshaba ho hlekefetswa.

src: ho bohlokwa ho hopola hore ha o hlabile mokgosi setsing sa mehala sa saps crime stop dintlha tsohle tsa hao di tla dula e le sephiri.
tgt: ku mcoka kukhumbula kutsi onkhe emathiphu latfolwe sikhungo sekulwa nebu gebengu sesaps agcinwa ayimfihlo.

src: ke ipiletsa ho bohle ba nang le tlhahisoleseding ka bosenyi bona ho e tlaleha mapoleseng molemong wa hore ho tshwarwe disenyi.
tgt: ngicela wonkhe umuntfu lonelwatiso mayelana nalelicala kutsi alibike kubaphatsi kute kuboshwe labo labagangile.

src: ha ho sa kgonahala ho qoba ho tlaleha diketso tsa bosenyi tse amang motabo ho ya kamoo bothata bona bo seng bo atile naheng ya rona.
tgt: ngenca yekukhula kwa lenkhinga kulelive lakitsi, akusakhonakali kutsi singawunaki umsebenti wetfu wekubika emacala lamayelana netemacansi.

src: ho ya ka molao o motjha o sa tswa kena tshebetsong, le haeba re hlompha matswalo a rona, re a lokela bohle jwale ho ya ka molao ho tlalehela mapolesa ha re na le tsebo, tumelo e lekaneng kapa pelaelo ya hore motho ya seng maemong a ho itshireletsa o hlekefeditswe ka motabo.
tgt: ngekuya kwetibonelelo temtsetfo letisandza kucala kusebenta, letingeta kulokutibophelela kwe kutiphatsa kwetfu, nyalo sonkhe sinemsebenti losemtsetfweni wekubika kubaphatsi uma sinelwa tiso, sinenkholelo noma sinetinsolo letivakalako tekutsi kunelicala letema cansi lelentiwe lelibhekiswe emuntfwini lobutsakatsaka.

src: e se e le tlolo ya molao ho se tlalehe ketso ya mofuta oo.
tgt: nyalo sekulicala kungabiki lolo luhlobo lelicala letema cansi.

src: ena ke karolo ya melao e meraro eo ke e saenneng pejana selemong sena e matlafatsang ntwa kgahlano le dikgoka tse amanang le bong mme e tshehetsa le ho sireletsa mahlatsipa.
tgt: lena ngulenye incenye yemitsetfo lemitsatfu lephasiswe ekucaleni kwa lomnyaka lekhulisa kulwa neludlame lwetebulili futsi lenika kusekela lokukhulu nekuvikeleka kulabo labasindzile kulokuhluku meteka.

src: hara tse ding, melao ena e atolosa mosebetsi wa rejistara ya naha ya disenyi tsa motabo, e matlafatse motjha wa ho fuputswa ha batho hore ha ba so etse bosenyi na, e boele e hlahise mefuta e meng ya bosenyi ba motabo.
tgt: kulokunye, lemitse tfo ikhulisa lobubanti berejista yavelonkhe yetephulamtsetfo tema cala etemacansi, ikhulisa lenchubo yekuhlola tephu lamtsetfo, kanye nekufaka letinye tinhlobo temacala etemacansi.

src: ho ntse ho sebetsanwa le ho kenya melao ena tshe betsong.
tgt: tinchubo tekwenta lemitsetfo kutsi isebente tisendleleni.

src: sena se kenyeletsa ho rupellwa ha batjhutjhisi le bomakgistrata, ho eletswa ha mapolesa ka ho nehwa ha babelaellwa beili, le ho tliswa ha diphetoho toko maneng ya diqoso kgahlano le motho hore di kenyeletse ditlolo tse ntjha tsa molao.
tgt: loku kufaka kuceceshwa kwebashu shisi nabomantji, kunika bonkhe basebenti besaps ticondziso tekunika ibhe yili, kanye nekubuyeketa kweluhlu lwemacala kute akhone kufaka emacala lamasha lasandza kusu ngulwa.

src: re batla hore tsena tsohle di be teng ho thusa mapolesa le makgotla a dinyewe ho fuputsa le ho qosa diketso tsa dikgoka tse amanang le bong ntle le mathata.
tgt: siyatsemba kakhulu kutsi tonkhe letindlela time ngemumo kute basebenti bakitsi betemtsetfo neti nkhantolo bakhone kuphenya futsi bashushise ngemphumelelo lenkhulu emacala lamayelana nelu dlame lwetebulili.

src: dikgoka kgahlano le bong le polao ya basadi le banana ke bothata bo seng bo iphile matla setjhabeng.
tgt: ludlame lolubhekiswe kubulili lobutsite neku bulawa kwabomake kuyinkhinga lenkhulu lejule netimbandze emimangweni yetfu.

src: ha ho a lekana ho tshwa rwa, ho qoswa, ho behwa molato le ho ahlolwa ha ba etsang diketso tsena.
tgt: akukaneli kutsi labo labalubhebhetselisako baboshwe, bashushiswe, balahlwe licala bese baya gwetjwa.

src: re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho ho lwantsha tse susumetsang dikgoka tse amanang le bong metseng ya rona, ho kenyeletsa tsela ya bophelo e reng banna feela ke dihlooho tsa malapa le baetapele.
tgt: kufuneka sisebentisane kute sibukane naloko loku banga ludlame lwetebulili emimangweni yetfu, lefaka ekhatsi indlela yekutiphatsa kanye nalenemikhuba leyenta emadvodza abukele phasi labasikati.

src: ntwa kgahlano le dikgoka tsa bong e batla hore re sebetse mmoho re le se tjhaba.
tgt: kucedza ludlame lwe tebulili kudzinga kutsi sisebentisane sibantfu.

src: menyetla ya dibasari kgaogelo letsebe sonia malinga (23) wa piet retief, mpumalanga o re ho fumana basari ya shoprite group ho mo netefaleditse bokamoso bo tjhatsi.
tgt: ematfuba emfundzate kubantfu labasha kgaogelo letsebe sonia malinga (23) wasepiet retief empumalanga utsi kutfola umfundzate lovela kushoprite group kucinisekise kutsi utawu ba nelikusasa lelitsembi sako.

src: malinga o fumane basari lebenkeleng lena le leholo la afrika borwa ka 2018. o entse kopo ya ba sari kamora ho phethela dithuto tsa hae tsa se kolong se phahameng, hoërskool piet retief.
tgt: malinga utfole lomfu ndzate kulesitolo se kutsengisa saseningi zimu afrika ngemnyaka we2018.

src: "ha ke hola ke ne ke batla ho ba ngaka, empa hamorao ka batlisisa ka makala a mang.
tgt: ufake sicelo salomfundzate emva kwekuphotfula imfundvo yemabanga lasetulu ehoerskool piet retief.

src: ka bala ka supply chain and logis tics management mme ya nkgahla hanghang.
tgt: "ngisakhula, ngacala ngafuna kuba ngudo kotela, kodvwa kamuva ngacala kubuka letinye tintfo.

src: ke a hopola ke ne ke dula ke shebella dilori di tsa di kena di etswa motseng wa heso ke ipotse hore ke mang ya netefatsang hore boleng le bongata ba thepa e nepahetse le hore e fihla moo e loketseng.
tgt: ngafundza ngete luchungechunge lokwe tfulwa kwetinsita kanye netekulawula kuhanjiswa kwemphahla futsi loku kwekugcina kwacishe kwangidvonsa ngaleso sikhatsi.

src: ka qala ka ba le thahase llo nakong eo," ho bolela malinga.
tgt: kungaleso sikhatsi lapho ngacala kuba nelutsandvo lalo msebenti," kusho ma linga.

src: malinga o ile a fumana lengolo la bcom honours ho logistics management yunivesithing ya johan nesburg mme a qala ho sebetsa shoprite a rupe llwa botsamaisi seba keng sa kabo ya thepa ka hlakola 2021. o sa tswa nyollelwa ho ba okamela tsa bolepi ba tlhokeho ya thepa mabenkeleng.
tgt: malinga watfola ticu tebcom honours kute kulawula kuhanjiswa kwemphahla enyuni vesi yasejohannesburg wabese ucala kusebenta eshoprite njengemphatsi wesikhungo losafundza abe aceceshwa ngendlo vana 2021. nyalo losesi usandza kukhushulelwa esikhundleni sekuba ngumhlatiyi weku gcwaliswa kabusha kwe mphahla.

src: ho ba karolo ya shoprite group ho atolositse tsebo ya malinga ya indasteri ya mabenkele.
tgt: kuba yincenye yeshoprite group kukhulise lwati lamalinga kule mboni yetekutsengisa.

src: "ho nthu tile haholo ka tsamaiso ya tlhophiso mme ho nthu sitse hore ke tswele pele ka ho ntshetsa pele bo kgoni ba ka le ho imatla fatsa mosebetsing wa ka," ho boletse yena.
tgt: "kungifundzisile kakhulu futsi nangalokungetiwe mayelana netekulawula kuhanjiswa kwemphahla nangekungenta kutsi ngichubeke nekutfu tfukisa emakhono ami nangekutsi ngikhule emsebentini wami," usho njalo losesi.

src: ho etsa kopo dikopo di buletswe ba keng sa lenaneo la dibasa ri le kenyeletsang bohle la shoprite group la selemo sa dithuto sa 2023. basari e ntsha r45 000 ho ya ho r70 000 ka se lemo, ho latela lekala la thuto le setheo sa thuto.
tgt: usifaka njani sicelo kufaka ticelo teluhlelo lwemfundzate lofaka konkhe weshoprite group kuvuliwe kumnya ka wekufundza we2023.

src: mokgwa o motjha wa ho lwantsha bobodu o kgola ditholwana vukuzenzele unnamed ntwa e kgahlano le bobodu e hloka boikemisetso botiileng ba sepolotiki le ditheo tse ikemetseng, tsenang le bokgoni ba ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao.
tgt: indlela lensha yekulwa nenkhohlakalo itfola imiphumela lemihle vukuzenzele unnmaed kulwa nenkhohlakalo kudzinga sandla setepolitiki lesicinile kanye netikhungo, letitimele, letikhonako kulwa nebugebengu.

src: puong ya ka ya pele ya pulo ya naha, ka 2018, ke ile ka itlama ka ho fetola mawa kgahlanong le bobodu ditheong tsa rona tsa setjhaba le ho lwantsha boqhekanyetsi le bohanyapetsi makaleng a poraefete ka sepheo le morero o tshwanang.
tgt: enkhulumeni yami yekucala yebunjalo belive, nga2018, ngenta sifungo sekutinikela kutsi ngigucule simo setenkhohlakalo eti khungweni tetfu ngiphi ndze futsi ngilwe neku khwabanisa nekubambisana ngenhloso lembi emkhakhe ni lotimele ngemandla ne nhloso lefananako.

src: ho tloha ka nako eo, esale re sebetsa ka thata ho matlafatsa le ho tshehetsa lekala la phethahatso ya molao la rona le dikemedi tse amehang.
tgt: kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi, siloku sisebenta ngeku tikhandla kute sicinise siphindze futsi sisekele emaejensi etfu nalaha mbisana nawo lacinisekisa kutfotjelwa kwemtsetfo.

src: re thehile botsamaisi ba dipatli siso ka hara botjhotjhisi ba naha ho shebana le bobodu bo tebileng le lekgotla le ikgethileng la dipatlisiso ho thusa hore ho be bonolo hore yuniti e ikgethileng ya dipatlisiso ya naha (siu) e busetse ditjhelete tse utswitsweng.
tgt: sakhe luphiko lwete kuphenya kumtimba wavelonkhe wetekushu shisa kute kutsi libukane nenkhohlakalo lenemandla nekutsi inkantolo lekhetse kile yente luphiko lwete kuphenya lolukhetsekile (isiu) ikhone kuvumbulula kakhulu futsi kalula timali letintjontjiwe.

src: re ile ra boela re fana ka tshehetso le mehlodi ho ditheo tse ding tse hlokolotse tsa twantsho ya botlokotsebe tse kang yuniti ya ho nka thepa, yuniti e ikgethileng ya ditlolo tsa molao tsa dikgwebo le botsamaisi ba dipatlisiso tsa botloko tsebe bo ka sehlohlolong, bo tsebahalang e le dihawks.
tgt: siphindze futsi sasita ngekwesekela nekunika imitfombolusito imitimba lebalulekile lelwa nebugebengu njengelu phiko lwekudla imphahla, luphiko lolukhetsekile lwetebugebengu beteku tsengisa kanye neluphiko lwekuphenya bugebengu lobuhamba embili, lolubitwa ngekutsi ngemahawks .

src: matsapa ana a kgola ditholwana.
tgt: lemitamo inemiphumela lemihle.

src: ka tshebedisanommoho le dienthithi tse bohlokwa tsa tsamaisong ya toka e kgahlano le botlokotsebe, botsamaisi ba dipatlisiso bo ngodisitse dinyewe tsefetang 20 tsa bobodu selemong se fetileng sa ditjhelete mme batlodi ba molao ba 65 ba qositswe.
tgt: ngekusebentisana netinhlaka letibalulekile eluhlelweni lwetebulu ngiswa kutebugebengu, luphiko lwetekuphenya selubhalise emacala enkhohlakalo langetulu kwalange20 kulomnyakati mali lophelile kwaphindze futsi kwaboshwa basolwa labange65.

src: dinyewe tsena di kenye letsa dinyewe tse mmalwa tsa ‘ho hula mmuso ka nko’ le tsa bobodu bo tebileng.
tgt: loku kufaka ekhatsi emacala lamanyenti 'ekubanjwa kwembuso ngabhongwane' kanye nalamanye emacala enkho hlakalo lamatima.

src: selemong se fetileng sa ditjhelete, yuniti ya ho nka thepa e ile ya fumana ditaelo tsa ho kgina dithoto tsa boleng ba r5.4 bilione tse amanang le melato ya bobodu, mme r70 milione e lefetswe ho letlole la pusetso ya thepa ya botlokotsebe.
tgt: kulomnyakatimali lophe lile, luphiko lwekudla imphahla lwatfola imiyalelo yekuvala emaakhawunti lalinganiselwa kutigidzi gidzi letir5.4 letiphatselene nemacala enkhohlakalo, kwatsi tigidzi letinger70 tafakwa esikhwameni semphahla yebugebengu levunjululiwe.

src: dilemong tse robedi tse fetileng, siu e buseditse matlole le dithepa tsa boleng ba r2.6 bilione mme ya behella ka thoko dikontraka tsa boleng ba r18 bilione.
tgt: kuleminyaka lesipho hlongo leyendlulile, isiu ivumbulule timali nempha hla leyenta tigidzigidzi letir2.6 yaphindze futsi yancamula emakontileka lenta tigidzigidzi letir18.

src: ka kakaretso dinyewe tse 119 tsa boleng bofetang r13 bilione di ngodisitswe ke siu ho lekgotla le ikgethileng la dinyewe.
tgt: isiu seyibhalise enkantolo lekhetsekile linani lemacala la119 lenta ngetulu kweti gidzigidzi letir13.

src: bobodu ke tlolo ya molao e rarahaneng haholo ho qoswa.
tgt: inkhohlakalo licala lelima tima kakhulu kulishushisa.

src: batlodi ba molao ba etsa ka bohohlehohle ho pata mehlala ya bona.
tgt: babhebhetseli batikha ndla ngalokukhetsekile ekuvaleni imikhondvo yabo.

src: ba thehile dikhamphani tse sa sebetseng ho pata ditshebetsano tse mpe, ditjhelete tse tsamaiswang ka potlako dipakeng tsa diakhaonto tse ngata, ho hlahisa lekeno le fosa hetseng ho balaodi ba lekgetho, mme ntlheng ya basebetsi ba mmuso, ho sebedisa metswale le beng ka bona ho kenya dikopo tsa dithendara ho pata ho nkakarolo ha bona.
tgt: bavula tinkampani letingasebenti tekutsi bafihle kuto imisebenti yabo lesolisako, njalonje bahambisa imali emkhatsini wemaakhawunti lama nyenti, betfule kubemtselo imalingena lengasiyo, futsi, basebenti bahulumende, basebentisa bangani nema lunga emndeni kutsi bafake ticelo temathenda kute kutsi bafihle kubandzakanyeka kwabo.

src: sena se bolela hore tsela eo bolaodi bo tla arabelang ditlo tsena tsa molao e tlameha ho ba e maemong a phahameng le yona.
tgt: lokuke kusho kutsi kuphendvula kwetiphatsi mandla nako kufanele kutsi kube ngulokushubile.

src: ka 2020, re thehile setsi sa tshebetsommoho se nang le mekgwa e menga ta ya tshebetso e le setsi sa tshebetso le ho shebana le ditlolo tsa molao tsa ditjhe lete tse ka sehlohlolong, ho kenyeletsa bobodu.
tgt: nga2020, sasungula sikhungo ifusion centre lesimkhakhaminyenti saba sikhungo sekusebentela kute kutsi kubukwane nemacala ebugebengu lahamba embili, kufaka ekhatsi inkhohlakalo.

src: setsi sena se kopanya bokgoni ba mmuso ba ho etsa dipatlisiso tsa ho thibela botlokotsebe le makala a tshireletso le tsa setsi sa mautlwela a ditjhelete, se hlahisang boutlwela ba dikemedi tsa phethahatso ya molao ho bo sebedisa patlisisong tsa tsona.
tgt: lesikhungo sihlanganisa emakhono ekuphenya etinhlaka tahulumende tekuvimbela bugebengu kanye netekuphepha kanye nalawo esikhungo sebunhloli kutetimali, lesi tfutfukisa tebunhloli kute kutsi tikhungo temtsetfo tiyisebentise eluphenyweni lwato.

src: dilemong tse pedi esale setsi sa tshebetsommoho se thehilwe, mokgwa wa sona wa mekgwa e me ngata ya tshebetso wa ‘ho latela tjhelete’ o fihleletse diphetho tse kgolo.
tgt: eminyakeni lemibili kusukela kwasungulwa ifusion centre , indlela yaso lemkhakhaminyenti ‘yekulandzela imali’ ibe nemiphumela lemihle lemikhulu kakhulu.

src: selemong se fetileng sa ditjhelete, mosebetsi wa setsi sa tshebetsommoho o ile wa tshehetsa dipa tlisiso tse 276 tsa bobodu.
tgt: kulomnyakatimali lophe lile, umsebenti wefusion centre usekele luphenyo lwenkhohlakalo neku khwabanisa lolunge276.

src: tjhelete e ka bang r659 milione e ile ya busetswa mmusong ka mokgwa wa ho baballa le pusetso ya merokotso ya botlokotsebe.
tgt: tigidzi letilinganiselwa kuletinger659 tabuyi selwa kuhulumende ngekusebentisa kulondvo lota nekuvumbulula inzuzo yebugebengu.

src: tjhelete e ka bang r613 milione ya merokotso e belaelwang e le ya botlokotsebe e ile ya kginwa.
tgt: kulinganiselwa kutigidzi letinger613 letavalwa lekusolwa kutsi tinzuzo tebugebengu.

src: setsi sa tshebetsommo ho qalonong se ne se the hetswe ho etsa dipatlisiso tsa bobodu bo mabapi le ditheko le dithendara tse amanang le covid .
tgt: ifusion centre ekucaleni kwayo yasungulelwa kuphenya inkhohlakalo lephatselene nekutsengwa kwetintfo tecovid19 .

src: thomo ya sona ha jwale e ntse e atoloswa ho kenye lletsa tshebediso tse she bana le ho pata mehlodi ya tjhelete, boqhekanyetsi, tsamaiso e mpe, matlole a boferekanyi le ditlolo tsa molao tse ding tse tebileng tsa ditjhelete.
tgt: manje umsebenti wayo sewukhulisiwe kute kutsi ufake ekhatsi kuphenya kushushunjiswa kwemali, kukhwabanisa, kulawula budlabha, kwesekela nge timali emaphekula kanye nalamanye emacala ebuge bengu labucayi.

src: haufinyane tjena, dihawks di hlalositse tse ding tsa kgatelopele tse entsweng ke sehlopha sa tshebetso sa twantsho ya bobodu, seo setsi sa tshebetsommoho e leng karolo ya sona.
tgt: emahawks asandza kwendlala letinye tinchube kelembili letentiwe licembu lelilwa nenkhohlakalo, ifusion centre lebe yincenye yako.

src: dipakeng tsa dilemo tsa ditjhelete tsa 2019 le 2022, babelaellwa ba 554 ba ile ba tshwarwa mabapi le bobodu, mme ba 142 ho bona ba ile ba fumanwa ba le molato.
tgt: emkhatsini wemnya katimali wanga2019 nanga2022, kuboshwe basolwa labange554 baboshelwa inkhohlakalo, kwatsi laba142 babo balahlwa licala.

src: sesebediswa se seng sa bohlokwa sa boutlwela ba ditjhelete ke tlhatlhobo ya mekgwa ya ho phela e entsweng ke ditshebeletso tsa lekgetho tsa afrika borwa (sars).
tgt: lelinye lithulusi lebunhloli lelibalulekile kulucwa ningo lwendlela yekuphila lolwentiwe luphiko lwe kugcogcwa kwemtselo lwaseningizimu (yisars).

src: selemong se fetileng, sars e phe thetse ditlhatlhobo tse 25 tsa mekgwa ya ho phela ya boleng bofetang r450 milione ho rarolla diphapano dipakeng tsa lekeno le phatlaladitsweng le mokgwa wa motho wa ho phela.
tgt: kulomnyaka lophelile, isars iphotfule lucwa ningo lwendlela yekuphila lolunge25 lolowenta tigidzi letinger450 kusombulula emagebe emkhatsini wemali lengenako ledzalulwako nendlela yekuphila yemuntfu.

src: ho hlakile hore mehato eo re e nkileng jwalo ka mmuso ho busetsa bokgoni, boitsebelo le botshepehi ba ditheo tse amehang twantshong ya bobodu e na le kgahlamelo e bonahalang.
tgt: kuyacaca kutsi letinyatselo letitsetfwe ngulolulawulo kubuyisela emandla, likhono nekuncomeka kwetikhungo letilwa nekhohlakalo tinemphu mela lobonakalako lomuhle kakhulu.

src: mosebetsi wa kopanelo wa dikemedi tsohle tse phethatsang molao o otla dinokwane moo ho utlwisang bohloko ka ho fetisisa: dipokothong tsa bona.
tgt: lomsebenti lohlanga nisiwe wawo onkhe lamaejensi lacinisekisa kutfotjelwa kwemtsetfo ubamba tigebengu lapho titincane ngakhona: emakhikhini ato.

src: matlole a setjhaba a ileng a tlatlapuwa le ho kgeloswa a ntse a busetswa mme ba ikara bellang diketsong tsena ba ntse ba qoswa ke makgotla a dinyewe.
tgt: timali tahulumende letaphangwa tabese tihanjiswa ngaletinye tindlela tiyavunjululwa kantsi futsi labo labatsintse kako mayelana naleto tento bashushiswa tinkantolo.

src: ela hloko matshwao a pele a kankere ya bongwaneng more matshediso ho hloka tlhokome diso ka kankere ya bongwaneng le matshwao a yona ho bolela hore bana ba bangata ba afrika borwa ba fumanwa ba ena le tshwaetso ha lefu lena le se le le boemong bo mpefetseng.
tgt: caphela timphawu letisheshe tivele tamdlavuta wasebuntfwaneni more matshediso kungacapheli mdlavuta wase buntfwaneni kanye netinkhomba tawo kusho kutsi bantfwana labanyenti baseningizimu afrika ngesikhatsi batfolakala kutsi banalesifo sisuke sesisezi ngeni leliphakeme.

src: ho fumanwa le ho phe kolwa ha kankere esale ka nako, ho eketsa menyetla ya ho fola ka botlalo.
tgt: uma ngabe mdlavuta usheshe watfolakala wabese uyelashwa, ematfuba ekwelulama ngalokuphelele abasetulu.

src: mohokanyi wa dipuisano wa mokgatlo wa kankere ya bana wa afrika borwa (choc), taryn seegers, o re ka ho tseba matshwao a tlwaelehileng a kankere batjheng, o ka thusa ho pholosa bophelo ba bona.
tgt: umchumanisi wenhlangano yaseningi zimu afrika yamdlavuta wasebuntfwaneni (ichoc) taryn seegers utsi ngekwati timphawu tamdlavuta kubantfu labancane, unga sita usindzise imphilo.

src: "matshwao a ka ba thata ho a bona hobane ho tlwaelehile hore bana ba hlahe maqhutsu, matetetso, kgolo e mahla hahlaha ya mmeleng, le phetophetoho ya maikutlo.
tgt: "timphawu netinkhomba kungaba matima kutibona emkhatsini wemaguludla, imitfubulela, timila kanye nekuntjintjantjintja kwemiva.

src: le ha ho le jwalo, ho e lemoha esale ka nako ho bohlokwahlokwa," o riaolo.
tgt: nanoma kunjalo, kutfolakala kwato kubalule kile kakhulu," kusho yena.

src: ho ya ka mokgatlo wa kankere wa afrika borwa (cansa), bana ba maa frika borwa ba pakeng tsa 800 ho isa ho 1 000 ba fumanwa ba ena le ka nkere selemo le selemo.
tgt: ngekuya kwenhlangano yaseningizimu afrika yetamdlavuta (icansa), njalo ngemnyaka bantfwana baseningizimu afrika labatfolakala banamdla vuta basemkhatsini walabange800 kuya kulaba 1 000. nanoma kunjalo, lenhlangano ilinganisela ekutsini ihhafu yalaba ntfwana eningizimu afrika abatfolwa.

src: le ha ho le jwalo, mokga tlo o lekanya hore halofo ya bana ba nang le kankere afrika borwa ha etswe diteko tsa tlhatlhojo ho hang.
tgt: kwenta siciniseko sekutsi mdlavuta ubonwa masinyane, ichoc yenta tinhlelo tekucaphelisa emimangweni, itjela batali nebantfwana ngetimphawu letisheshe tibekhona teku caphelisa labafanele kutsi baticaphele.

src: ho thusa ho etsa bo nnete ba hore kankere e bonwa ka pele kamoo ho ka kgonehang ka teng, choc e etsa mananeo a tlhokomediso metseng, a rutang batswadi le bana ka matshwao a pele ao ba lokelang ho a ela hloko.
tgt: lenhlangano yesekela bantfwana nebantfu labasha labanamdlavuta noma tifo tengati letisongela imphilo kanye nemindeni yabo.

src: mokgatlo o tshehetsa bana le batjha ba nang le kankere kapa mafu a madi a kotsikotsi le ba malapa a bona.
tgt: "sihlose kusheshe sisi bone lesifo bese siselapha ngemphumelelo.

src: "re ikemiseditse ho ntlafatsa ho e lemoha esale ka nako le ho nolo fatsa phepelo ya kalafo e sebetsang.
tgt: nanoma ngunini, ichoc ingana kekela bantfwana nebantfu labasha labangetulu kwalaba1 500, ibe futsi yesekela ngekwetengcondvo nangekwetenhlalo imindeni lengetulu kwale1 500," kusho seegers.

src: ka nako efe kapa efe, choc e ka ba le bana le batjha ba fetang 1 500 tlhokomelong ya yona, e ntse e boela e fana ka tshehetso ya maikutlo le kelello ho malapa a fetang 1 500," ho rialo seegers.
tgt: kulomnyakatimali lophe lile, seegers utsi ichoc yakhona kutfula tinsita kubantfwana laba1 724, bantfu labasha laba553 kanye nebantfu labadzala laba2 232 ngetinhlelo tayo letingumgogodla.

src: selemong se fetileng sa ditjhelete, seegers o re choc e kgonne ho thusa bana ba 1 724, batjha ba 553 le batho ba baholo ba 2 232 ka mananeo a yona a mantlha.
tgt: "tinsita tetfu tifaka ekhatsi kwesekelwa ngekwemiva ngesikhatsi basesebukene namdlavuta, kudvudvutwa, kunakekelwa kwaseku pheleni kwemphilo kanye nekwesekelwa uma sewu shonelwe," kusho seegers.

src: "ditshebeletso tsa rona di kenyeletsa tshehetso ya maikutlo ha ba ntse ba ena le kankere, ho ba kgothatsa, le ho ba hloko mela ha ntswe ba lwanela ho phela le ho tshehetsa ka tsa poloko bao ba hloka halletsweng," ho rialo seegers.
tgt: timphawu tast siluan tamdlavuta wasebuntfwaneni s – funa lusito lwetekwe lashwa kusenesikhatsi lwetinkhomba letichube kako.

src: matshwao a ree letsweng ka st siluan a kankere ya bongwaneng s – batla thuso ya dingaka esale ka nako bakeng sa matshwao a sa iphodising.
tgt: i – licashata lelimhlo phe esweni, kufica liso lokusha, kungaboni emehlweni lokuvelenje kwenteke ngekushesha noma kukhukhumuka kwendvumbu yeliso.

src: i – letheba le lesweu ka leihlong, ho qepha ho hotjha, ho foufala ho sa tsejweng hore ho hlaha kae kapa thaka ya leihlo e ruruhang.
tgt: l – sigadla esiswini, engculwini, enhloko, emkhonweni, emile nteni, emasendzeni noma emandlaleni.

src: ntlafatso ena ya n3 e matlafatsa maafrika borwa owen mngadi mduduzi jijana ke monga disability empowerment movement, eo e leng e nngwe ya dikhampani tseo ha jwale di fumanang molemo ntlafatsong ya dibilione tse 26 tsa diranta ya mmila o moholo wa n3 o pakeng tsa pietremaritzburg le durban provinseng ya kwazulunatal.
tgt: kutfutfukiswa kwen3 kutfutfukisa bantfu baseningizimu afrika owen mngadi mduduzi jijana longumnikati wenhlangano letfutfukisa labaphila nekukhubateka, lekungulenye yetinkapani letizuzako nyalo kula mabhiliyoni lar26 ekutfutfukisa umgwaco lomkhulu in3 emkhatsini kwemgungundlovu nasethekwini kwazulunatali.

src: projekte ena, e thakgolwang ke lekala la naha la mebila la afrika borwa (sanral), e netefatsa hore borakgwebo ba kang jijana ha ba fumane feela molemo, empa, ka nqa e nngwe, ba theha mesebetsi bakeng la ba bang.
tgt: lomklamo, loholwa yisouth afri can national road agency soc limited (isanral), icinisekisa kutsi bosomabhizinisi labafana najijana abagcini kuphela ngekuzuza kodvwa baphindze bavulele labanye ematfuba emsebenti.

src: jijana, ya nang le bokowa, o re khamphani ya hae e hloma matshwao a mmila ho tloha hilton ho ya fihla pietermaritzburg.
tgt: jijana, lophila nekukhubateka, utsi inkapani yakhe isebenta kufaka timphawu temgwaco emkhatsini kwasehilton nasemgungundlovu.

src: o hira batho ba 13, mme o re projekte ena e tlisitse phetoho maphelong a bona.
tgt: ucashe bantfu laba13 futsi utsi lomklamo sewutiguculile timpilo tabo.

src: "jwalo ka batho ba nang le bokowa, re bontshitse hore re na le bokgo ni.
tgt: "njengebantfu lesiphila nekukhubateka, sikhombisile kutsi natsi sinelikhono.

src: ha re sa phela feela ka ho amohela diphallelo.
tgt: asikanciki kuphela kumali yesondlo sahulumende.

src: re etsa mosebetsi ka sebele," o rialo jijana.
tgt: senta umsebenti wangemphela," kusho jijana.

src: molaodi wa lenaneo la sanral la n3, tsepo matekane, o re khamphani ya hae e entse bo nnete ba hore 30% ya mosebetsi e nehwa dikhamphani tsa sebaka seo tse nang le bokgoni ba ho fana ka ditshebeletso tse fapafapaneng.
tgt: umphatsi waloluhlelo lwesanral n3 tshepo matekane utsi inkapani yakhe icinisekisile kutsi umse benti lo30% waniketwa tinkapani tendzawo letinelikhono lekwenta imisebenti letitsite.

src: ketso ena e hlahisitse menyetla e mengata bakeng la dikgwebo tse nyenyane tsa batjha, tsa batho ba neng ba beheletswe ka thoko le basadi.
tgt: loku kwavula ematfuba lamanengi kumabhizinisi lamancane laphetfwe lusha, bantfu lebebacindzetelekile kanye nabomake.

src: "ho na le dikgwebo tse 108 tse nyenyane, tse bohareng le tse nyenyane haholo tseo ha jwale di sebetsang diprojekteng tse fapafapaneng," o itsatso.
tgt: "kunemabhizinisi la108 lamancane, lasemkhatsini nalasafufusa kungunyalo lasebenta kumiklamo lehlukahlukene," usho njalo.

src: nokuthula zondi wa ingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading o ile a fumantshwa konteraka ya phepelo ya mobu le ho kenngwa ha diphaephe tsa phalliso ya metsi.
tgt: nokuthula zondi weingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading waniketwa inkontileka yekuphakela umhlaba nekufaka emaphayiphi ekuhambisa emanti.

src: o re khamphani ya hae e hirile batho ba robedi ba nang le boitsebelo, ho kenyeletswa le bakganni.
tgt: utsi inkapani yakhe icashe bantfu laba8 labanemakhono, labafaka ekhatsi bashayeli.

src: zondi o boetse a re basadi le bona ba na le bokgoni jwalo ka banna, le hore kha mphani ya hae e na le setumo se setle phanong e ntle ya ditshebeletso.
tgt: zondi ungete watsi bomake nabo banelikhono njengabo babe futsi inkapani yakhe inemlandvo lomuhle wekwenta umsebenti.

src: "re utlwisisa hantle bohlokwa ba nako, mme re fihllella dipakana tsa rona ho netefatsa hore projekte e sebetsa ka tshwanelo.
tgt: "siyakuvisisa lokubaluleka kwesikhatsi nekugcina sikhatsi lesibekiwe kute sicinisekise kutsi umklamo uhamba kahle ngalokufanelekile.

src: re mo tlotlo ka monyetla ona, mme re tshepa hore re tla fumana menyetla e mengata ho feta, e le hore khamphani ya rona e tle e hole ho latela maemo a kaho," o boetse a rialo.
tgt: sibonga kutfola lelitfuba futsi sitsemba kutsi kukhulu lesitakutfola kute sikhulise inkapani yetfu ihambi sane nemazinga etekwakha," wangeta ngekusho njalo lomake.

src: ana ke maikutlo a motlatsi wa letona la ntshetsopele ya setjhaba, hendrietta bogopanezulu, ya sa tswa thakgola lenaneo la bobuelli le bitswang 999 la bohloko bo pharale tseng ba aklhohole maseeng a inngweng (fasd).
tgt: imiklamo lemcoka yahu lumende wavelonkhe matekane utsi lomklamo wekutfutfu kisa lobitwa ngekutsi yidurbanfree state logistics and industrial corridor unesilinganiso sesabelotimali lesitigidzigidzi ler26 futsi ungu lomunye wemiklamo lomcoka wendlelalisu lehlangene yahulu mende wavelonkhe.

src: sepheo sa morero ona ke ho kgothaletsa setjhaba sohle ho thusa ho tshireletsa masea a inngweng ka ho ruta batho, haholoholo basadi ba dilemong tsa ho beleha, malebana le kotsi ya ho nwa alkhohole nakong eo ba ithwetseng kapa ba nyantshang.
tgt: uphindze umbandzakanye kuguculwa kwe kuchumana kwemigwaco lemikhulu kute kutfutfukiswe kuhamba kahle kwetigitjelwa nangekukhululeka.

src: kotsi e hlaiswang ke fasd e ama maphelo a bana ho ya ho ile, mme ha e na pheko, mme bana ba tswalwang le boemo bona ba ba le mathata a mmele le a kelello," o itsatso motlatsi wa letona bogopanezulu nakong ya thakgolo.
tgt: sigaba lesitsintsekako semgwaco in3 kuleminyaka leyengcile besine kumphintjana kwetigitjelwa, kakhulu ngetikhatsi letiphitsitelako ngoba linyenti letitfutsi temitfwalo lemikhulu letichamuka elugwini lasethekwini tisebentisa lomgwaco kuya egauteng nakuletinye tifundza letisemkhatsini kwalelive.

src: o boetse a re afrika borwa e tumme hampe ka ho ba le bothata ba ho nowa ha alkhohole, moo naha ena e balellwang le tse mpe ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng ka lebaka la maemo a yona a ho nowa ha alkhohole.
tgt: futsi bekuba netingoti temgwaco letinengi letibangwa bashayeli betitfutsi temtfwalo ngenca yekunganakekeli uma bahamba lapho kune majika lamakhulu.

src: motlatsi wa letona bogo panezulu o sa tswa etela dikarolo tse fapaneng tsa naha, a ruta basadi ka mathata a ba kwang ke ho nowa ha alkhohole nakong ya boimana e le karolo ya letsholo la 999 la fasd.
tgt: "akusiko kuphela kugcwala kwetitfutsi kwamalanga onkhe lokwenta kutsi tigitjelwa tihambe kahle lokusunjululiwe nga lokwakha imizila lengetiwe, kutfutfukiswa kwen3 kutawenta kutsi kwenyuke tekuphepha.

src: alkhohole e ka senya bophelo ba lesea la hao le inngweng vukuzenzele unnamed basadi ba baimana ba na le boikarabelo ba ho se nwe hobane alkhohole e ka etsa maemo a amang hampe popeho ya lesea.
tgt: tjwala bungalimata imphilo yemntfwana wakho asengakatalwa vukuzenzele unnamed bomake labakhulelwe banemsebenti weku tivikela banganatsi tjwala ngoba bungabanga sifo lesitsikameta kukhula kwemntfwana.

src: ana ke maikutlo a motlatsi wa letona la ntshetsopele ya setjhaba, hendrietta bogopanezulu, ya sa tswa thakgola lenaneo la bobuelli le bitswang 999 la bohloko bo pharale tseng ba aklhohole maseeng a inngweng (fasd).
tgt: loku kushiwo lisekela lendvuna yetekufutfukisa tenhlalo, hendrietta bogo panezulu, losandza kucala luhlelo lwekulwa nesifo i999 foetal alcohol spectrum disorder (ifasd).

src: sepheo sa morero ona ke ho kgothaletsa setjhaba sohle ho thusa ho tshireletsa masea a inngweng ka ho ruta batho, haholoholo basadi ba dilemong tsa ho beleha, malebana le kotsi ya ho nwa alkhohole nakong eo ba ithwetseng kapa ba nyantshang.
tgt: inhloso yalomkhankhaso kugcugcutela imimango kutsi isite kuvikela bantfwana lebasengakabelekwa ngekufundzisa bantfu, kakhulu bomake labasakhona kubeleka, mayelana nebu ngoti bekunatsa tjwala ube ukhulelwe noma usamu nyisa.

src: "ke taba ya bohlokwa ya hore basadi bohle ba immeng le bao ba lakatsang ho beleha masea a phetseng hantle ba qobe tshebediso ya alkhohole.
tgt: "kumcoka kutsi bonkhe bomake labakhulelwe nalabo labanesifiso sekutala bantfwana labaphile kahle bayekele kunatsa tjwala.

src: kotsi e hlaiswang ke fasd e ama maphelo a bana ho ya ho ile, mme ha e na pheko, mme bana ba tswalwang le boemo bona ba ba le mathata a mmele le a kelello," o itsatso motlatsi wa letona bogopanezulu nakong ya thakgolo.
tgt: umonakalo lobangwa yifasd uba wemphilo yonkhe futsi awubuyiseleki emuva, futsi bantfwana labatalwa nalokugula baba netinkinga tasemtimbeni netasengco ndvweni," kwasho lisekela lendvuna bogopanezulu emcimbini wekwetfulwa kwaloluhlelo.

src: o boetse a re afrika borwa e tumme hampe ka ho ba le bothata ba ho nowa ha alkhohole, moo naha ena e balellwang le tse mpe ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng ka lebaka la maemo a yona a ho nowa ha alkhohole.
tgt: wangeta ngekutsi iningi zimu afrika yatiwa ngekuba nenkinga yekunatsa tjwala, lelive libalwa njengalamanye lamabi lahamba embili emhlabeni ngenca yemazinga alo ekunatsa tjwala.

src: motlatsi wa letona bogo panezulu o sa tswa etela dikarolo tse fapaneng tsa naha, a ruta basadi ka mathata a ba kwang ke ho nowa ha alkhohole nakong ya boimana e le karolo ya letsholo la 999 la fasd.
tgt: lisekela lendvuna bogopanezulu usandza kuhambela tincenye letehlukahlukene talelive letfu, afundzisa bomake mayelana nebungoti bekunatsa tjwala bakhulelwe njengencenye yemkhankaso we999 fasd.

src: ha a ne a le boitekong, motse ng wa rustenburg, leboya bophirima, o boleletse baahi hore maemo a tshebedisompe ya alkhohole lokeisheneng leo bo a tshosa.
tgt: lesikhatsi aseboitekong erustenburg enyakatfo nshonalanga, watjela takhamuti kutsi lizinga leku setjentiswa kabi kwetjwala emalokishini liyesabeka.

src: mosadi ya nang le dikgwe di tse nne a imme eo e leng moahi wa boitekong, basetsana tlalang (ya dilemo di 28), ya ileng a ba teng ho le leng la matsholo ana, o itse o ile a tlohela ho nwa alkhohole ho hang ka mora ho iphumana a imme, a ba a bolela hore o ba teng dithutong tse hlophiseditsweng baimana le tsa tlhahisoleseding tliliniking.
tgt: make lonetinyanga letine akhulelwe lohlala eboite kong, basetsane tlalang (28), lobekahambele lomunye walemikhankaso, utse wayekela futsi wagcina ngci kunatsa emva kwekutfola kutsi ukhulelwe futsi watsi sewuhambela emaseshini asemtfolamphilo elwatiso newesikhatsi lesandvulela kubeleka.

src: o kgothaleditse basadi ba bang ba immeng hore ba tlohele ho nwa alkhohole hanghang, esita le ho sebedisa dithethefatsi.
tgt: uncusa labanye bomake labakhulelwe kutsi bayekele leso sikhatsi kunatsa tjwala nekusebentisa tidzakwamiva.

src: boitseko ba ho bopa afrika borwa e hlomphang haholo ditokelo tsa botho vukuzenzele unnamed ka letsatsi la 12 loetse 1977, stephen bantu biko o ile a shwela ditlamong tsa sepolesa tjhankaneng e bohareng ya pretoria.
tgt: umshikashika wekubuyisa ubuntfu eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed mhla ti12 inyoni 1977, ste phen bantfu biko washona agcinwe maphoyisa ejele lelatiwa ngepretoria central prison.

src: seriti sa botho, e leng motheo o kgubung ya boitseko ba hae ba ho ikelellwa ha batho ba batsho, ke seo a ileng a swetswa ka sona.
tgt: sitfunti sebuntfu, leku simiso lesihamba embili kulobushoshovu bakhe bekubuyisa sitfunti semuntfu lomnyama, sacekelwa phasi.

src: ka mantswe a ramolao wa lelapa sir sydney kentridge, e bile "lefu la mahlomola, hape le bodutu − hodima phate e adilweng hodima lejwe ka hara sele ya tjhankana".
tgt: ngekwemagama emmeli wemndeni wakhe sir sydney kentridge, "kushona kwakhe bekubuhlungu kakhulu futsi bekayedvwa ashonela emethini lephasi esemendeni yelijele."

src: le hona jwale e ntse e le ntho e utlwisang bohloko haholo taba ya ho hopola hore steve biko o ne a ena le dilemo tse 30 feela ha a eshwa.
tgt: kutawuhlala kuyintfo lebanga lusizi lolukhulu emva kwayo yonkhe leminyaka leyengcile, kukhumbula kutsi steve biko bakaneminyaka le30 kuphela uma ashona.

src: o ile a bolawa a sa le motjha tjha ke bao ba ileng ba tshoswa ke matla le kamohelo ya molaetsa wa maikutlo a hae a boitokollo esita le matsapa a hae a ho kenya boikgantsho le seriti ho banna le basadi ba batsho.
tgt: wabulawa asengakafiki esicongweni semphilo yakhe ngilabo bebasaba emandla ekubona imibono yakhe lesetulu yekutikhulula kanye nemitamo yekufaka kumuntfu lomnyama kutitsandza nekuba nesitfunti emadvodzeni nakubomake besive lesinsundvu.

src: nakong ya bophelo ba hae, ha a ka a ba le hona ho bona seo a neng a se bitsa ‘kgau ya mabenyane’, e leng ho fihlelleha ha setjhaba sa sebele.
tgt: azange akhone kubona ekuphileni kwakhe loko lokubitwa ngekutsi ‘ngumklomelo lokhatimu lako", lekukubona buntfu bangemphela.

src: ha a ngola ka maikemisetso ana, o hopoleha a ne a ye a re: "qetellong re tla ba boemong ba ho rwesa afrika borwa tlokola e kgolo ka ho fetisisa – tshobotsi e matla ya botho.
tgt: abhala ngalomcondvo, kwadvuma kutsi watsi: "ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi sitawukhona kupha iningizimu afrika sipho lesikhulu kunato tonkhe – kukhulisa sitfunti sebuntfu."

src: "nakong eo re fumanang tokoloho ya rona ka selemo sa 1994, re ile ra utlwisisa hore tokelo ya ho vouta e mpa e le karolo feela ya boitseko ba rona ba seriti sa botho.
tgt: uma sincoba sitfola inkhu luleko yetfu ngemnyaka we1994, besivisisa kutsi lilungelo lekuvota liyincenye leyodvwa yemzabalazo wetfu wekutfola sitfunti sebuntfu.

src: nakong ya dilemo tse mashome a mabedi a metso e robedi a demokrasi ya rona, re tjametswe ke diphephetso tse ngata, tse kang bofutsana, tlhokeho ya mesebetsi le ho se lekalekane.
tgt: eminyakeni lemashumi lamabili nesiphohlongo singene kuntsandvoye linyenti, sihlangabetene netinseyeya letinyenti, letifana nebuphuya, kuswelakala kwemisebenti nekungalingani.

src: ka lebaka lena, ka dinako tse ding re ye re timellwe ke ho ananela hore na re se re kgathile tema e kae ho phediseng metheo eo molao wa rona wa motheo o theilweng hodima yona hape e le eo mohopolo le dithuto tsa steve biko di tsepameng ho yona.
tgt: ngenca yaloko, sivamise kunga boni kutsi sisuka khashane kanganani kute sikhone kufeza timiso letisisekelo semtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi letichumanisa imicondvo netifundziso tasteve biko.

src: ka selemo sa 1977, mmuso o kgopo o ile wa bolaya e mong wa baetapele ba hlwahlwa ba naha ya rona ka ho mo tima dijo, metsi le meriana eo a neng a e hloka ka ho fetisisa ka lebaka la ho tetekwa ho soto ke sepolesa sa puso ya kgenthollo.
tgt: ngemnyaka we1997, umbuso lobewungenalu velo wabulala lomunye umholi walelive lakitsi lobekatse mbisa kakhulu ngekumncisha kudla, emanti kanye nekwelashwa lobe kakudzinga kakhulu ngenca yekushaywa kabuhlungu ngemaphoyisa elubandlu lulo.

src: ka mora dilemo tse mashome a mabedi, nakong ya kahlolo e dihilweng ka 1997, lekgotla la molao wa motheo le ile la re ho phethwa ha ditokelo tsa mantlha tsa moahi e mong le e mong, le ho ikitlaeletsa hore a fumane ditokelo tsa hae tsa boiphediso ke letshwao la bohlokwa la setjhaba sa demokrasi se batlang ho lopolla seriti se ileng sa lahleha.
tgt: emva kweminyaka lemashumi lamabili, sincumo senkantolo semnyaka we1997, inkantolo yemtsetfosisekelo yatsi kuphumelelisa emalungelo lasisekelo awo wonkhe umuntfu nekutfola ema lungelo abo etemnotfo kuluphawu lwemmango wentsandvoyelinyenti loluhlose kubuyisela sitfunti lesilahlekile.

src: naheng ya afrika borwa kajeno, re ntse re tswela pele ho sebeletsa hore ho phethahatswe ditokelo tsa mantlha tsa moafrika borwa e mong le e mong e le hore a tle a phele bophelo ba boleng bo hlokang mafu, tlala le tshotleho.
tgt: namuhla eningizimu afrika, siyachubeka kuse bentela kuphumelelisa emalungelo lasisekelo awo wonkhe umuntfu waseningizimu afrika kute baphile imphilo lesezingeni lenge nato tifo, indlala nekuswela.

src: mebuso ya demokrasi ka ho hlahlamana e nnile ya ntshetsa pele maano a ho lopolla seriti sena se ileng sa lahleha sa batho bao e leng bona ba bangata ka ho fetisisa ba naha ena ka ho ba fumantsha thuto, tlhokomelo ya bophelo, matlo a bodulo le ditshebeletso tsa motheo.
tgt: imibuso yentsandvoye linyenti lelandzelanako isebentise imitsetfomigomo leletsa sitfunti sebantfu balelive lebesilahlekile ngekubanika imfundvo, kunakekelwa kwetemphilo, tindlu kanye netinsita letisi sekelo.

src: ka hara afrika borwa kajeno, thuto e nang le boleng ke tokelo ya mantlha.
tgt: namuhla eningizimu afrika, kutfola imfundvo lesezingeni kulilungelo lelisisekelo.

src: mmuso o etsa matsete dithutong tsa dikolo tsa bana ba dikonyana, ka ho tshehetsa diphetho tsa thuto bakeng la baahi ba rona ba banyenyane ka ho fetisisa, moo o fanang ka diphallelo tsa kimollo ya setjhaba ka mokgwa wa mananeo a phepo dikololng ho netefatsa hore baithuti ba banyenyane ba fumana diphetho tse ntle ka ho fetisisa, ka moo ho ka kgonehang.
tgt: hulumende utjale timali kumfundvo legcile ekukhuliseni kahle bantfwana, ekusekeleni imiphumela yetifundvo ebantfwaneni balelive lakitsi labasesebancane, futsi kusita ummango ngeluhlelo leku phakela bantfwana kudla etikolweni kucinisekisa kutsi bafundzi labasesebancane batfola imiphumela lesetulu.

src: ka morero wa naha wa thuso ya ditjhelete tsa ho ya sekolong wa baithuti le ka mekgwa e meng ya tshehetso ya mmuso, diketekete tsa maafrika borwa a manyeyane ho tswa malapeng a futsanehileng di nnile tsa kgona ho ba dingaka, boramolao, dititjhere, borasaene, ditsebi tsa mesebetsi ya matsoho le borakgwebo.
tgt: ngalesikimu savelonkhe selusito lwetimali kuba fundzi nangaletinye tinhlobo telusito lwahulumende, tinkhulungwane tebantfu labasha baseningizimu afrika labavela eminde nini lephuyile bakhonile kuba bodokotela, bammeli, bothishela, bososayensi, emaathizeni nabosomabhi zinisi.

src: mmuso o tshehetsa baahi ba futsanehileng le ba fokolang ka morero o matla wa polokeho ya setjhaba mme o fana ka menyetla ya mosebetsi ka mananeo a phumantsho ya mesebetsi ya setjhaba.
tgt: hulumende usekela takhamuti letibutsakatsaka ngekusebentisa tinhlelo tekusita emakhaya laphuyile futsi iniketa ematfuba emisebenti ngaletinhlelo tahulumende tekucasha bantfu labanengi.

src: nakong ya afrika borwa ya kgatello eo steve biko a ileng a phela ho yona, bolokolohi ba puo bo ne bo kginnwe mme boitseko ba sepolotiki bo ne bo kgahlametswa ka hore motho a kwallwe tjhankaneng kapa ka ketso e bohloko ho feta ena.
tgt: kuleningizimu afrika lebeyicindzetela leyabulala steve biko, bekute kukhu luma ngekukhululeka kantsi kuba sishoshovi kutepolitiki bekuholela ekutseni uboshwe ngaphandle kwekushushiswa noma ubulawe.

src: ka hara afrika borwa kajeno, batho ba batjha ba dilemo di lekanang le tsa steve biko kapa tse ka tlaase, ba moleng o ka pele wa boitseko malebana le dintho tse ba amang, mme ba kgona ho itlhopha kantle ho tlhekefetso kapa ho lelekwa.
tgt: namuhla eningizimu afrika, bantfu labasha labaneminyaka lelingana naleyo bekanayo steve biko noma lemincane kunaleyo bahamba embili kutebu shoshovi betintfo leti sedvute nabo, futsi bayakhona kutihlela kahle ngekukhululeka ngaphandle kwekuhlukunyetwa noma kwekudzingiswa.

src: bolokolohi ba puo le ba ho ikamahanya, tokelo ya ho hwanta le tokelo ya tekatekano ka pele ho molao e fumantshwa batho bohle.
tgt: kukhu luma nekuhlanganyela ngekukhululeka, lilungelo lekubhikisha kanye nelilungelo lekulingana ngembi kwemtsetfo ku yalandzelwa kubo bonkhe bantfu.

src: re le naha, re se re kgathile tema e kgolo malebana le ho baballwa ha seriti sa botho, e leng motheo oo steve biko a o babaletseng.
tgt: sisive, sihambe libanga lelidze kute siphumelele kutfola sitfunti sebuntfu, lekusimiso besihlonishwa ngusteve biko.

src: le ha ho le jwalo, re sa ntse re na le tema e kgolo e re emetseng.
tgt: kodvwa, sisanendlela lendze leku mele siyihambe.

src: kantle ho mosebetsi, kantle ho ntlo, motlakase kapa metsi a phallang, kantle ho mobu, kantle ho bokgoni ba ho etsa mosebetsi kapa menyetla ya ho fumana mosebetsi, dimilione tsa maafrika borwa di ntse di haellwa ke maphelo ao di a batlang le ao e leng tokelo ya tsona ho ba le ona.
tgt: kungasebenti, kungabi nendlu, nagezi noma emanti lahambako, kungabi nemhlaba, kungabi nemakhono noma ematfuba, tigidzi tebantfu baseningizimu afrika basengakayitfoli imphilo lebafuna kuyi phila.

src: ke ka hona mmuso o sebetsang mmoho le balekane ba setjhaba ho aha moruo o kenyeletsang bohle, ho theha mesebetsi, ho thusa dikgwebo ho tswela pele le ho lwantsha bofuma le tlala.
tgt: kungako hulu mende asebentisana nebalingani betemnotfo kute kwakhiwe umnotfo lofaka wonkhe umuntfu, kwakhiwe ematfuba emisebenti, kuncedvwe emabhizinisi aphumelele futsi kuliwe nebuphuya nendlala.

src: lenaneo la ho matlafatsa mahlatsipa le kgutlisa tshepo owen mngadi lenaneo la ho matlafatsa mahlatsipa la thohoya ndou (tvep) le sebetsa ka thata ho kgutlisetsa tshepo ho makala a toka ka boikgathatso ba ona bo tebileng bo reretsweng ho thusa batho ba phonyohileng tlhekefetso ya bong (gbv) le tlhekefetso ya motabo ka ho ba fumantsha ditshebeletso tsa ho thoba maikutlo le kelello.
tgt: luhlelo lwekunika bahlukunyetwa emandla lubuyisa litsemba owen mngadi luhlelo lasethohoya ndou lwekunika bahlu kunyetwa emandla (itvep) lufuna kubuyisa litsemba nekutitsemba kuluhlelo lwetebulungiswa ngekusebentisa tinyatselo talo letinemandla letihlose kusita labo labasindzile kuludlame lolumayelana netebulili (igbv) nasekudlwengulweni ngekubanika tinsita tetengco ndvo.

src: e thehilwe limpopo dilemong tse fetang tse 20 tse fetileng, tvep e sebeletsa sepetleleng sa tshilidzini le sa donald fraser ka tlasa masepala wa lehae wa thulamela.
tgt: letvep leyacalwa elimpo po eminyakeni lema20 leye ngcile, isebentela etibhedlela itshilidzini nedonald fraser letingaphasi kwamasipala wasekhaya ithulamela.

src: molaodi wa yona a tshwereng mokobobo, fhatuwani manthada, o re lenaneo lena le ikemiseditse ho ruta ho tshwela ka mathe boitshwaro ba tlhekefetso ka motabo, tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana ka hara setjhaba sa thohoyandou, hobane mefuta ena ya tlhekefetso e mengata tulong ena.
tgt: libamba lemcondzisi waloluhlelo fhatuwani manthada utsi loluhlelo luhlose kufaka indlela yekubuka tintfo lengavumeli nakancane kutsi kube nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi, ngekwegbv kanye nekwebantfwana kuletakhamuti tasethohoyandou, ngoba kuliciniso lelimsulwa kutsi loluhlobo lwemacala ayenteka kulendzawo.

src: o re nakong e fetileng, dipalopalo tsa botlokotsebe di ne di bontsha hore hona le dinyewe tse ngata tsa tlhekefetso ya motabo thohoyandou, empa tvep e nkile mehato ya ho hlaba mokgosi le ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa ho thoba maikutlo a mahlatsipa bakeng sa ho thibela thohako ena.
tgt: utsi esikhatsini lesengci le, lubalobalo lwemacala beluvamise kukhomba kutsi bewamanengi emacala ekudlwengula ethohoyandou, kodvwa itvep ibe neligalelo lelikhulu ekuletseni lwatiso nekunika bantfu tinsita tekwelulekwa ngekuhlukumeteka kute kuliwe nalomkhuba lomubi.

src: jwalo ka ha e le mona lefatshe le tla be le kena letsholong la matsatsi a 16 kgahlano le tlhekefetso ya basadi le bana ho tloha ka la 25 pudungwana ho fihlela ka la 10 tshitwe, manthada o re ba kgotsofetse ka tema e seng e kgathilwe ya ho kgothalletsa setjhaba ho utlwisisa ditokelo tsa bona le ho tlaleha botlokotsebe.
tgt: njengoba umhlaba wonkhe utawube ubuke lomkhankhaso wetinsuku leti16 tebushoshovi bekucedza ludlame lolubhekiswe kubomake nasebantfwaneni kusuka mhla ti25 lweti kuya kumhla ti10 ingongoni, manthada utsi loluhlelo lunelisekile ngaloku leselikwentile lekukugcugcutela takhamuti kutsi tiwavisise emalungelo ato nekutsi tibike uma kwenteka emacala.

src: "tvep e fumana palo e mahareng a 80 le 100 ya mahlatsipa a merusu ya malapeng kgwedi le kgwedi, athe ho tlalehwa dinyewe tsa tlhekefetso ya motabo tse 45 ho isa ho 50 ka kgwedi," ho bolela manthada.
tgt: "letvep itfola bahlukunye twa beludlame lwasekhaya labasemkhatsini kwe80 ne100 njalo ngenyanga, bese kuba macala ekudlwengulwa la45 kuya ku50 labikwa njalo ngenyanga," kusho manthada.

src: ditsha tse nang le lenaneo lena di fa mahlatsipa ditshebeletso tse ngata tse fapaneng, tse kenyeletsang thuso ya tsa molao, tshireletso kgahlano le bahlekefetsi ba bona, ho beha dinyewe leihlo, ho thojwa maikutlo le ho matlafatswa ka ntshetsopele ya tsebo, e leng dintho tse nehang lehlatsipa monyetla wa ho qala botjha.
